trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_EIRIKUR_000_001<tab>Trades<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, eh? You've that look about you. Interested in putting those skills of yours to use undertaking a leve or two?

TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_EIRIKUR_000_002<tab>It's all above board─all handled under the auspices of the Crystal Exarch, worry not. We process and dole out a mountain of leves every day. Register with us and you can peruse the open ones at your leisure.
TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_EIRIKUR_000_003<tab>You'll be compensated too, in case you were afraid we were running some sort of charity. So─shall I put your name down in the ledger?
TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_EIRIKUR_000_004<tab>Right, then! <var 29 EB02 /var>, was it? Let me just finish filling out this remaining bit of paperwork, and then you'll be all set!
TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>You may now undertake Crystarium leves by speaking with Eirikur.
TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_EIRIKUR_000_006<tab>You dabble in trades? Could've fooled me. Are you sure?
TEXT_LUCKYR001_03602_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 70 or above.
